DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to determine the prevalence of diabetes and non-diabetic glucose metabolism anomalies (glucose intolerance, non-diabetic fasting hyperglycaemia in patients about to undergo coronary artery bypass grafting (CABG). In addition, the effect of these anomalies on post CABG morbi/mortality in the short term will be evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Prevalence of anomalIes of Glucose Metabolism in Patients Undergoing a Coronary Artery Bypass Graft (CABG)
DOC.criteria: persons who have provided oral consent patients about to undergo coronary artery bypass grafting age >18 years persons without national health insurance cover Adults under guardianship Pregnant or breastfeeding women
